String.string: We have to keep reducing their numbers.

Hunt {@LinkCreature:47#4002#argonomorph naga wyrmlings}, {@LinkCreature:47#1002#argonomorph Tirkai grizzlies}, and {@LinkCreature:47#4003#argonomorph gula smashers} on the {@Rgn:47005$$Argon Frontier}.
See {@Creature:247#1005$$Chenace} at {@Rgn:47007$$Blightroar Research Station} for your reward.
